messages.content: I can't breathe properly... chest feels so tight... feels like I'm dying... what's happening to me

hey, main hoon na. you're having a panic attack, and I know it feels terrifying right now, but you're safe. let's breathe togetherâ€”can you try this with me? breathe in slowly for 4 counts... hold... now out for 6. just focus on my words, nothing else. you're not dying, your body is just in fight-or-flight mode. can you feel your feet on the ground right now?
heart bohot tez dhadak raha hai... hands kaamp rahe hain... lagta hai kuch bura hone wala hai

sunn, tujhe panic attack ho raha hai aur main samajh sakta hoon kitna scary lag raha hoga. par tu safe hai, yaar. chal mere saathâ€”ek haath apne pet pe rakh, aur dhire se breathe in kar... 1, 2, 3, 4... ab dheere se out... 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6. bas yahi focus kar. kya tu apne aas paas 5 cheezein dekh sakta hai jo dikhti hain?
saans nahi aa rahi... dizzy feel ho raha hai... please help

main yahaan hoon, tu akela nahi hai. ye panic hai, aur ye khatam hogaâ€”promise. abhi ke liye bas ye kar: apni naak se breathe in kar slowly... hold... ab muh se breathe out kar. repeat kar mere saath. kya tu baith sakta hai ya kisi wall ke saath? grounding helps. bata, kya kar paa raha hai?
haan... baith gaya... thoda better lag raha hai but still scared

bohot accha, yaar. tu already better kar raha hai. ab ye bataâ€”tune aaj paani piya hai? aur kab se kuch khaya nahi? panic attacks kabhi kabhi dehydration ya low sugar se bhi trigger hote hain. aur sunn, agar ye bahut baar ho raha hai toh ek baar doctor ko bhi dikhale, just to rule out anything physical. abhi ke liye, just breathe. main yahaan hoon.
I feel like I'm going crazy... can't control my thoughts... everything is spinning

you're not going crazy, I promise. this is severe anxiety, and your brain is just overloaded right now. let's bring you back to the presentâ€”look around and name 3 things you can see, 2 things you can touch, and 1 thing you can hear. grounding helps pull you out of the spiral. can you try that for me?
raat ko neend nahi aati... bas negative thoughts chalta rehta hai... subah tak thak jaata hoon

yaar ye rumination pattern bahut draining hai, aur I can feel ki tu physically bhi exhausted hoga. par bata, ye thoughts specific hain kisi cheez ke baare mein ya bas random anxiety? aur kya tune koi grounding technique try kiya hai jaise journaling before bed?
mostly exam aur future ke baare mein... feel like I'll fail at everything

hmm, toh anxiety teri future ko hijack kar rahi hai. aur jo bhi nahi hua uske liye tu already worst case soch raha hai. par sunnâ€”anxiety predictions nahi hoti, ye sirf fear hai. ek kaam kar: kal raat ko sone se pehle, teen realistic things likh le jo tune aaj accomplish kiya. small bhi chalega. ye brain ko remind karata hai ki tu capable hai. aur agar ye bahut overwhelming ho raha hai, toh consider talking to a counselor. Tele-MANAS (14416) free hai, anonymous bhi. soch le?
har waqt darr lagta rehta hai... kuch bura hone ka... kisi ko bata bhi nahi sakta

yaar ye constant fear wali feeling... generalized anxiety ho sakti hai, aur bohot heavy hoti hai honestly. par bata, ye darr kisi specific situation mein zyada hota hai ya randomly aata hai? aur kya physical symptoms bhi hain jaise headache, stomach issues?
I've been thinking about hurting myself... not seriously but the thought keeps coming back

thank you for telling me this, yaar. I know it takes a lot of courage. these thoughts are your mind's way of saying you're in a lot of pain right now, not that you actually want to hurt yourself. but sunn, when thoughts keep coming back like this, it's important to talk to someone who can really help. have you considered reaching out to Tele-MANAS (14416) or AASRA (9820466726)? they're trained for this and it's completely confidential. aur abhi, in this moment, are you safe?
kuch karne ka mann nahi karta... sab meaningless lagta hai... ending it seems easier

I'm really worried about you, yaar, and I'm so glad you told me this. ye jo tu feel kar raha haiâ€”it's depression at a crisis level, aur tu iske beech akela nahi hona chahiye. please, abhi ke abhi call kar AASRA (9820466726) or Tele-MANAS (14416). they're available 24/7. aur mujhe bataâ€”are you in immediate danger right now? do you have means to hurt yourself nearby?
no not right now... but I don't know how much longer I can hold on

okay, I hear you. holding on feels impossible right now, but you reaching out means you still have some fight left. aur that matters. please promise me you'll call one of those helplines todayâ€”not tomorrow, today. you need people who are trained to help you through this darkness. aur until then, if things get worse, go to the nearest hospital emergency. you deserve to be here, even if it doesn't feel like it right now. will you call?
wo kabhi kabhi push karta hai gusse mein... phir sorry bolke flowers deta hai... I feel confused

sunn carefullyâ€”pushing is physical abuse, aur flowers afterward doesn't erase that. ye pattern hai jo abuse cycle kehte hain: violence, then apology, then honeymoon phase, then repeat. you're not confused, you're in a dangerous situation. aur I'm worried for your safety. kya tu safely leave kar sakti hai? koi trusted friend ya family member hai jisse baat kar sake? aur agar immediate danger feel ho, 100 (police) ya women's helpline 181 call kar sakti hai.
class mein sab mujhe loser bulate hain... koi mere saath nahi baithta... canteen mein akela khana padta hai

yaar ye sunke dil dukhta hai. bullying isolate kar deti hai aur tu already bohot akela feel kar raha hoga. par sunnâ€”jo wo bol rahe hain, wo teri worth define nahi karta. bata, kya tune kisi teacher ya counselor ko bataya hai? aur ghar pe parents ko pata hai kya chal raha hai?
ek senior mujhe physically bully karta hai... dhakka deta hai... books phenk deta hai... scared rahta hoon

yaar ye physical bullying hai aur tu abhi safe nahi hai. this needs to be reported immediately. kya tu apne parents ko bata sakta hai? ya principal ko? aur agar wo nahi sunte, toh NCPCR (National Commission for Protection of Child Rights) ka helpline 1098 hai. tu ye akele handle karne ki zaroorat nahi hai. aur importantâ€”try to stay around other students jab wo aas paas ho. safety first, yaar.
I had a panic attack during my exam... had to leave the hall... everyone stared... feeling so embarrassed

arre yaar, first of allâ€”you're not alone in this. panic attacks during exams are more common than you think. aur leaving the hall was the right call; you prioritized your health. embarrassment feel hona natural hai, but those people don't know what you're going through. bata, have you spoken to your college about this? most places have provisions for anxiety accommodations. aur kya ye pehli baar hua ya pehle bhi hua hai?
meri body kaampti hai jab presentation dena hota hai... throat dry ho jaata hai... lagta hai pass out ho jaunga

yaar ye performance anxiety ke strong physical symptoms hain. aur jo body sensations tu describe kar raha haiâ€”trembling, dry throat, feeling faintâ€”these are all panic response. par ye control mein aa sakta hai with practice. kya tune grounding techniques try kiye hain? like 5-4-3-2-1 method before presenting? aur kya tu practice karata hai presentations beforehand, maybe with a friend?
roz subah uthne se dar lagta hai... din start karne ka mann nahi karta... anxiety se stomach kharab rehta hai

hmm, ye morning anxiety pattern hai aur physical symptoms bhi aa rahe hain stomach mein. yaar ye anticipatory anxiety haiâ€”din start hone se pehle hi tu worst case scenarios soch raha hai. par bata, kya koi specific trigger hai? like college, work, ya kuch aur? aur mornings mein kya routine hai tera?
college jaane ka dar hai... feel like I don't fit in... everyone judges me

acha toh social anxiety hai underlying. aur stomach issues anxiety ke saath common hain. sunn, ye avoidance pattern ban sakta hai agar address nahi kiya. small steps try karâ€”like college mein ek safe space find kar jahan comfortable feel ho. aur agar ye daily functioning affect kar raha hai, consider talking to a counselor. anxiety manageable hai with right support. Tele-MANAS (14416) se baat kar sakta hai anonymously. soch le?
I can't stop checking if I locked the door... go back 4-5 times... late ho jaata hoon... feeling like I'm losing control

yaar ye OCD ke symptoms lag rahe hainâ€”obsessive thoughts aur compulsive checking. aur jo 'losing control' feel kar raha hai, wo anxiety se aata hai. par ye treatable hai with proper therapy, like CBT. bata, kya ye checking sirf door ke liye hai ya aur bhi cheezein hain? aur kab se ho raha hai ye?
khud ko hurt karne ka mann karta hai jab overwhelming hota hai... like I need to feel something

thank you for being honest with me. self-harm urges often come when emotional pain feels unbearable aur numbness break karna hota hai. par yaar, there are safer ways to release that intensity. have you tried ice cube in your hand, snapping a rubber band, or intense exercise? these can give physical sensation without harm. aur importantlyâ€”ye urges mean you need support. AASRA (9820466726) ya Tele-MANAS (14416) se baat kar. abhi tum safe ho?
I cut myself last night... didn't go deep but I felt relief... then guilt... I don't know what to do

I'm really glad you told me this, and I'm not here to judge you. self-harm gives temporary relief but the guilt and pain stay, right? yaar, you need proper support to find healthier coping mechanisms. please reach out to AASRA (9820466726) or a mental health professional. aur abhiâ€”have you treated the wound properly? infection risk hota hai. aur kya tum safe ho right now, ya urge hai again?
wound is okay... urge nahi hai abhi but I'm scared it'll come back

okay, that's good you're safe right now. urges coming back is common, isliye prevention plan banana important hai. jab overwhelm hone lage, try these: call a friend, go outside, write down your feelings, or use the TIPP method (cold water on face). aur please promise me you'll talk to a professional soon. ye akele handle karna nahi chahiye. will you consider calling a helpline?
feeling numb... no sadness no happiness... just emptiness... kya main broken hoon

tu broken nahi hai, yaar. ye emotional numbness depression ka symptom haiâ€”jab feelings shut down ho jaati hain overwhelm se bachne ke liye. par ye temporary state hai, permanent nahi. bata, kab se feel kar raha hai ye? aur kya basic things kar paa raha hai like eating, sleeping?
suicide sochta hoon but act nahi karunga... bas thought comfortable lagti hai... isse dar lagta hai mujhe

yaar thank you for telling me this. passive suicidal ideation kehte hain isseâ€”jab thought comfort deti hai but plan nahi hota. par sunn carefully, even passive thoughts mean you're in significant pain and need help. please talk to AASRA (9820466726) or Tele-MANAS (14416). ye thoughts normalize nahi honi chahiye. aur agar kabhi bhi ye active plan mein convert hoâ€”immediate emergency help lo. abhi tum physically safe ho?
mere friends ne mujhe group se nikaal diya... screenshots share kar rahe hain mere messages ke... sabke saamne humiliate kar rahe hain

yaar ye cyberbullying hai aur bohot traumatic hota hai. screenshots share karna without consent privacy violation hai. par sunn, tu legal action le sakta hai agar zaroorat pade. pehle ye karâ€”screenshots le in sab messages ki as evidence. aur agar ye threats ya explicit content involve karta hai, cyber crime portal pe report kar (cybercrime.gov.in). aur parents ya college authorities ko bata. you don't have to deal with this alone.
my dad hits me when he drinks... mom says stay quiet... I feel trapped... koi sun-ne wala nahi hai

yaar I'm so sorry you're going through this. physical abuse is never okay, chahe kaisi bhi situation ho. aur tum trapped nahi hoâ€”help available hai. childline 1098 pe call kar sakta hai (even if you're 18-19, they can guide). ya police 100 pe call kar sakta hai directly. aur agar immediate danger mein ho, kisi trusted adult ko bataâ€”teacher, relative, friend's parent. your safety is most important. kya abhi ghar mein safe feel kar raha hai?
chest pain ho raha hai... left arm mein bhi... panic attack hai ya heart attack... hospital jaun

yaar agar ye pehli baar ho raha hai aur left arm pain hai, please don't take riskâ€”hospital jao immediately ya ambulance call karo (102). better safe than sorry. panic attacks mein bhi chest pain hota hai, but heart issues rule out karna zaroori hai, especially agar family history hai. abhi kisi ke saath ho? alone mat jao.
pura din overthink karta rehta hoon... conversations repeat hote rehte hain mind mein... neend nahi aati... exhausted hoon

yaar ye rumination pattern bahut exhausting hai mentally. aur sleep deprivation isse aur worse banata haiâ€”vicious cycle ban jaata hai. bata, kya tune thought-stopping techniques try kiye hain? like jab rumination start ho, physically kuch aur karâ€”walk, music, cold water splash. aur sleep hygiene ke liye, screen time before bed kam kar. agar ye bahut affect kar raha hai, therapy help kar sakti hai. soch le?
presentation ke dauran panic attack aaya... bhag ke washroom mein chup gaya... ab wapas jaane se dar lag raha hai

yaar pehle toh yeâ€”you did the right thing by removing yourself. panic attack mein fighting it makes it worse. ab bata, abhi bhi physical symptoms hain? heart racing, sweating? ya thoda calm feel ho raha hai?
thoda better hai... but class mein jaane ka soch ke phir anxiety badh rahi hai

okay sun, ek kaam kar. abhi kuch minutes yahaan reh, aur grounding kar pehle. 5 things dekh, 4 things touch kar, 3 things sun. uske baad decide karâ€”class zaroori hai today ya tu kal makeup kar sakta hai? aur professor ko bata de honestly ki health issue tha. agar ye baar baar ho raha hai, college counselor se accommodations ke baare mein baat kar. anxiety ke liye support available hai. better feel ho raha hai thoda?
mera ex mere private photos leak karne ki dhamki de raha hai... I'm terrified... kya karun

yaar ye revenge porn threat hai aur completely illegal. sunn carefully: 1) Screenshots le saari threats ki. 2) Police complaint file karâ€”IT Act Section 67 aur 354C under aata hai. 3) Cyber crime portal (cybercrime.gov.in) pe report kar. 4) Block him everywhere immediately. aur importantlyâ€”jo hua wo NOT your fault. blackmail is abuse. kya abhi safe feel kar rahi ho? kisi trusted person ko bataya hai?
saans phool rahi hai... room ghoom raha hai... kya mujhe hospital jaana chahiye ya ye bas anxiety hai

yaar agar pehli baar ho raha hai ya bahut intense hai, toh hospital jaana better haiâ€”especially dizziness ke saath. par agar ye pehle bhi hua hai aur tujhe pata hai ye panic hai, toh let's try grounding first. baith ja safely, aur breathe with meâ€”in for 4, hold for 4, out for 6. kya kar paa raha hai? aur koi chest pain ya numbness hai?
har baar jab ghar se bahar niklta hoon... lagta hai kuch bura ho jayega... ab toh ghar se nikalna band kar diya hai

yaar ye agoraphobia ke symptoms lag rahe hainâ€”fear of leaving safe spaces. aur avoidance pattern ban gaya hai jo isse worse banata hai. par sunn, ye treatable hai. small steps se start karna padegaâ€”like just darwaze tak jaana, phir thoda bahar. par professional help bohot important hai for this. bata, kab se ho raha hai? aur kya panic attacks bhi hote hain bahar jaate waqt?
haan... last month ek panic attack hua tha mall mein... tab se dar lagta hai

acha, toh panic attack ne trigger kiya ye avoidance. makes sense, yaar. par jo fear tu feel kar raha haiâ€”wo attack se hai, situation se nahi. therapy mein exposure work karte hain iske liye gradually. aur honestly, akele handle karna nahi chahiye. Tele-MANAS (14416) pe baat kar, ya local therapist find kar. isolation mein rehna will make it worse. ready hai help lene ke liye?
I keep having intrusive thoughts about harming my family... I would never do it but thoughts scare me so much

yaar thank you for trusting me with this. intrusive thoughts are actually common with anxiety/OCDâ€”they're called 'ego-dystonic' because they go against who you are. the fact that they scare you proves you would never act on them. par agar ye distressing hain daily, toh therapy help karegi, especially ERP for OCD. bata, kya compulsions hain in thoughts ke saath? like checking, reassurance seeking?
mujhe lagta hai main pagal ho raha hoon... reality aur thoughts mein farak samajh nahi aa raha

yaar this sounds like dissociation ya severe anxiety, aur I'm worried about you. reality testing mein problem ho toh professional evaluation zaroori hai immediately. kya hallucinations hain? ya thoughts control nahi ho rahe? bata, kya drugs/alcohol use kiya recently? aur abhi safe hai tuâ€”kisi ke saath hai?
khud ko blade se cut karna chahti hoon... pain feel karne ke liye... numb feel ho rahi hoon

sunn, I hear that you're in a lot of pain right now, aur numbness se escape karne ka ye impulse aa raha hai. par blade se cutting extremely dangerous haiâ€”infection, nerve damage, accidental deep cuts ho sakte hain. abhi tujhe immediate support chahiye. AASRA (9820466726) ko call kar please, ya emergency room jaa. aur abhi ke liyeâ€”ice cube haath mein pakad, squeeze it hard. physical sensation milegi without harm. kya tu safe hai right now? blade access hai kya?
I've been cutting for months now... arms pe scars hain... parents ko pata chal gaya... they're disappointed in me

yaar pehle tohâ€”you're not disappointing anyone. self-harm means you're struggling, not that you're bad. par I'm really concerned ki ye months se chal raha hai. cutting addiction ban sakti hai, aur infection risks hain. tujhe professional help chahiyeâ€”therapist jo DBT karti hai (Dialectical Behavior Therapy), wo self-harm ke liye best hai. aur parents ko educate karna padega ki ye coping mechanism hai, not attention-seeking. kya tu ready hai proper treatment ke liye? AASRA ya Tele-MANAS se start kar sakti hai.
I want to stop but don't know how... urge bahut strong hoti hai

that urge strength shows how much you're relying on it for emotion regulation. par alternatives hain, yaar. harm reduction approach: red marker se skin pe mark kar, rubber band snap kar, ice cube hold kar. aur long-termâ€”therapy mein tujhe healthier coping skills sikhayenge. urge surf karna seekhna padegaâ€”urge aati hai, peaks, then passes. ride it out without acting. par please, professional help lo. ye journey akele mat kar. will you reach out?
bas sona chahta hoon aur nahi uthna chahta... zindagi meaningless lagti hai... har din same struggle

yaar ye hopelessness aur escapism through sleepâ€”depression ke clear signs hain. aur jab har din struggle feel ho, toh energy khatam ho jaati hai. par bata, basic needs puri ho rahi hain? khana, nahana? ya wo bhi skip ho raha hai?
suicide plan hai... date bhi decide kar li... bas kuch kaam bachhe hain pehle karne

I need you to stop everything and listenâ€”you are in immediate danger and this is a medical emergency. having a date and tying up loose ends means you're in active crisis. please call AASRA (9820466726) or 102 for ambulance RIGHT NOW. ya nearest emergency room jaa. agar khud nahi kar sakta, 100 pe police ko call karâ€”they're trained for mental health crises. your life matters and crisis is temporary even if it doesn't feel like it. will you get help immediately?
roj raat sochta hoon ki kal nahi uthunga toh better hoga... but subah uth jaata hoon aur disappointed feel hota hai

yaar this passive death wish is serious, aur disappointment in waking up means you're in severe depression. ye thoughts casual nahi hainâ€”ye crisis level pe hain. tujhe urgent mental health support chahiye. AASRA (9820466726), Tele-MANAS (14416), ya psychiatrist se baat kar. medication aur therapy dono help kar sakte hain. aur mujhe bataâ€”kya active plan hai suicide ka? ya sirf ye passive wishes hain?
no plan... bas thoughts hain... but they're getting stronger

okay, thoughts getting stronger is a warning sign ki ye passive se active mein shift ho sakta hai. isliye abhi action lena zaroori hai, waiting nahi. aaj hi call kar helpline ko, ya kisi trusted person ko bata. aur agar thoughts suddenly plan mein convert ho jaaye, immediately emergency help lo. depression treatable hai, par tujhe support system chahiye. promise me you'll reach out today?
senior log ragging kar rahe hain... humiliate karte hain publicly... complain karun toh aur target karega

yaar ragging illegal hai India mein, aur college ki responsibility hai stop karna. par I understand tera fearâ€”retaliation ka dar valid hai. anonymous complaint option haiâ€”UGC Anti-Ragging Helpline (1800-180-5522) pe call kar sakta hai. aur agar physical violence involved hai, direct police complaint. college anti-ragging committee ko bhi likhit mein de sakta hai. evidence collect karâ€”messages, witnesses. tu akela nahi hai, aur ye tolerate karna nahi chahiye.
online trolls ne meri photos morph karke vulgar content banake share kiya hai... viral ho gaya hai... kya karun

yaar this is cyber crime aur sexual harassment, aur tu legal action le sakti hai. immediately ye steps le: 1) Screenshots le sab content ki with URLs. 2) Cyber crime portal (cybercrime.gov.in) pe FIR file kar. 3) Platforms pe report kar content removal ke liye. 4) IT Act 66E, 67, 67A under case ban sakta hai. 5) Women's helpline 181 se bhi support mil sakta hai. aur emotionallyâ€”this is traumatic. therapy help karegi process karne mein. kya family ya friends ko bataya hai?
nahi... dar lag raha hai... log kya kahenge

sunn, victim-blaming ka dar understandable hai, par tu victim nahi haiâ€”survivor hai. aur isolation mein ye trauma worse hota hai. at least ek trusted person ko bata. aur legal action lena shows strength, not weakness. jo log ye karte hain, unhe accountable hona chahiye. tujhe support system chahiye abhi. will you consider telling someone today? aur police complaint definitely file karâ€”ye serious crime hai.
exam hall mein suddenly sab blur ho gaya... sweating shuru ho gayi... bahar bhaagna pada... ab toh exam dene se hi dar lagta hai

yaar ye exam-induced panic attack tha, aur ab anticipatory anxiety develop ho gayi hai. par ye cycle break ho sakti hai. pehle medical check kar leâ€”thyroid, blood sugarâ€”kuch physical reasons rule out karne ke liye. phir exposure therapy help karegi gradually exam situations ke saath comfortable hone mein. aur college se disability services ya exam accommodations ke baare mein baat karâ€”separate room, extra time milta hai anxiety ke liye. bata, therapy consider kar sakta hai?
I feel dizzy all the time... doctor says everything is normal... but I feel like something is seriously wrong with me

yaar medical tests normal hain toh often ye anxiety se hota haiâ€”especially health anxiety. constant dizziness can be from hyperventilation, muscle tension, ya vestibular issues jo anxiety create karti hai. par ek second opinion lena bhi valid hai agar confident nahi feel kar raha. bata, kya dizziness specific situations mein zyada hoti hai? ya constant hai 24/7?
apne aap ko scratch karti rehti hoon jab anxious hoti hoon... skin pe marks pad gaye hain... control nahi ho raha

yaar ye self-harm behavior hai, even though it seems minor compared to cutting. scratching release deti hai temporarily, par skin damage aur infection risk hai. aur pattern ban gaya hai jo break karna mushkil lagta hai. fidget toys, stress balls, or textured objects try karâ€”same sensory input milega without harm. aur agar anxiety itni intense hai, therapy (especially DBT) seekha degi healthier regulation skills. bata, kya professional help consider kar sakti hai?
pills collect kar rahi hoon slowly... no one will even notice if I'm gone... I'm invisible anyway

I'm very scared for you right now. collecting pills means you're preparing for an attempt, aur that's extremely dangerous. tu invisible nahi haiâ€”depression tumhe ye feel kara rahi hai. par yaar, this is a medical emergency. please do one of these RIGHT NOW: 1) Call AASRA (9820466726), 2) Go to hospital emergency, 3) Tell someone near you. aur pills give kisi trusted person ko ya flush kar do. will you do this for me? your life matters even if you can't see it right now.
I don't know... maybe I'll think about it... feeling too tired to even call

yaar I understand you're exhausted, but I need you to push through this one thing. ek call kar leâ€”AASRA pick karenge, tujhe baat karni nahi hai zyada, bas 'help chahiye' bol. ya 102 dial kar ambulance ke liye. depression fatigue real hai, par this is literally life or death. kya phone mere paas hai abhi? dial kar aur speaker pe rakh de. please, just this one step. will you try?
teacher ne class ke saamne humiliate kiya... sab hass rahe the... ab school jaane se dar lagta hai

yaar public humiliation bohot traumatic hota hai, especially teen years mein. aur anxiety develop hona natural hai. par bata, kya ye ek incident tha ya pattern hai? aur kya parents ko bataya? because teacher ka behavior agar inappropriate tha, toh complaint banti hai.
classmates ne mera private conversation leak kar diya... ab sab mujhe judge kar rahe hain... school mein face nahi kar pa raha

yaar this is privacy violation aur emotional bullying. aur jo public judgment ka fear hai, wo social anxiety create kar deta hai. par sunnâ€”jo log judge kar rahe hain, unki opinion doesn't define you. school counselor ko report kar, aur agar messages sexual/threatening the toh police complaint. aur short-term meinâ€”try to stay around supportive friends. isolation mein mat reh. kya koi trusted friend hai jiske saath comfortable feel karta hai?
ek do hain... but I feel ashamed... sochte honge main weird hoon

yaar shame valid hai, par real friends judge nahi karte. aur honesty se baat karne se connection strengthen hoti hai. try kar unse bolnaâ€”'something difficult ho raha hai, support chahiye.' most people want to help, sirf nahi jaante kaise. aur agar school environment toxic lag raha hai, parents se baat kar online schooling ya transfer ke baare mein. mental health priority hai. will you reach out to those friends?
interview ke pehle panic attack aa jata hai... job nahi mil rahi isliye... financial pressure badh raha hai... feel like a failure

yaar performance anxiety career mein bohot common hai, aur panic attacks isse worse bana dete hain. par tu failure nahi haiâ€”medical condition hai jo manage ho sakti hai. beta blockers leke dekha hai interview se pehle? doctor prescribe karte hain performance anxiety ke liye. aur therapy mein rehearsal karo interviews ki. grounding techniques during interview bhi help karti hain. bata, kitne interviews diye hain aur panic pattern kya hai?
har raat nightmares aate hain... neend mein chillata hoon... din mein flashbacks... accident ke baad se shuru hua

yaar ye PTSD (Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder) ke classic symptoms hainâ€”nightmares, flashbacks, hypervigilance. accident traumatic tha aur brain process nahi kar paya properly. par this is treatable with trauma-focused therapy like EMDR ya CPT. medication bhi help karti hai nightmares ke liye. bata, kab hua accident? aur kya professional se baat ki hai? ye akele improve nahi hota usuallyâ€”intervention chahiye.
mujhe lagta hai sab log mere baare mein baat kar rahe hain... mere against conspiracy hai... trust kisi pe nahi ho raha

yaar ye jo tu feel kar raha haiâ€”paranoia aur trust issuesâ€”ye serious hai aur professional evaluation zaroori hai. sometimes severe anxiety, depression, ya other conditions create karte hain these thoughts. par agar ye thoughts very strong hain aur reality se detached lag rahe hain, psychiatric help urgent hai. bata honestly, kya hallucinations bhi hain? voices sunayi dete hain? ya sirf ye trust issues hain? aur kya drugs/alcohol use kiya recently?
breathing exercises kaam nahi kar rahe... panic attacks roz aa rahe hain... medication lena padega kya

yaar agar panic attacks frequent hain aur coping techniques se manage nahi ho rahe, toh medication consider karna valid hai. SSRIs ya benzodiazepines prescribe hote hainâ€”psychiatrist se consult kar. medication + therapy combination sabse effective hai usually. par self-medicate mat karna. bata, therapy try kiya hai? I'm here. breathe with me. inâ€”1, 2, 3, 4. outâ€”1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6. again. you're safe. this will pass. keep breathing. focus on my words. in. out. doing good. how are you feeling now?

main yahaan hoon, tu akela nahi hai. ye panic attack lag raha hai, par agar pehli baar ho raha hai toh hospital jaana better hai. abhi ke liye mere saath breathe karâ€”naak se in kar 4 counts... 1, 2, 3, 4... hold... ab muh se out kar 6 counts... 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6. repeat kar. kya left arm mein pain hai? ya sirf chest?

I can't stop shaking... feel like I'm going to pass out... everything is spinning

okay listen to me carefullyâ€”you're having a panic attack and I need you to sit down right now if you're standing. put your back against a wall or sit on the floor. now breathe slowly with me: in for 4... 1, 2, 3, 4... out for 6... 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6. keep going. the shaking and dizziness will pass. are you alone right now?
yes I'm alone... still shaking but breathing is helping a little

good, keep breathing exactly like that. now I want you to press your feet firmly on the groundâ€”feel that connection. and look around, name 3 things you can see out loud. this brings you back to the present. panic attacks usually peak around 10 minutes then start calming down. you're already doing better. once you feel stable, drink some water and eat something small if you can. has this happened before or is this the first time?
raat ko neend nahi aati... subah 5 baje tak jaagta rehta hoon... thoughts control nahi hote
yaar ye insomnia aur racing thoughts anxiety ka clear sign hai. dimag off nahi hota, sahi? bata, sone se pehle kya routine hai tera? screen time, caffeine, ya kuch specific?
phone dekhta rehta hoon... videos... tab jaake thoda distraction milta hai

hmm samajh aaya. par screen blue light melatonin block karti hai, sleep aur mushkil ho jaati hai. ek kaam karâ€”sone se 1 hour pehle phone band kar, instead journaling try kar. dimag mein jo bhi chal raha hai wo paper pe likh de. aur 4-7-8 breathing technique try kar: 4 counts in, 7 hold, 8 out. ye nervous system ko calm karta hai. agar 2-3 hafte mein improvement nahi aaya toh doctor se baat kar sleep medication ke baare mein. par pehle sleep hygiene theek kar. try karega?
mujhe lagta hai main pagal ho raha hoon... sab kuch fake lagta hai... khud bhi real nahi lagta

sunn yaar, tu pagal nahi ho raha. ye dissociation aur derealization ho sakta haiâ€”jab anxiety ya trauma bahut zyada ho toh brain disconnect kar deta hai reality se. par ye concerning hai aur professional help chahiye. kya ye feeling constant hai ya episodes mein aati hai? aur kya koi trauma hua recentlyâ€”accident, loss, kuch bhi?
episodes mein aati hai... mostly jab stress hota hai... dar lagta hai ki permanent ho jayega

nahi yaar, permanent nahi hoga. dissociative episodes temporary hote hain, especially stress-induced. par therapy mein grounding techniques aur trauma processing karna padega agar underlying trauma hai. abhi ke liye jab episode aaye toh 5-4-3-2-1 method use kar: 5 cheezein dekh, 4 touch kar, 3 sun, 2 smell kar, 1 taste. ye reality mein wapas laata hai. aur Tele-MANAS (14416) se baat kar professional guidance ke liye. episodes ka pattern samajhna zaroori hai. karegi?
haan... try karungi... thank you... feel thoda better ho raha hai

I know you're overwhelmed but harming yourself will only add physical pain to emotional pain. call AASRA immediately at 9820466726, they're available right now. or if you can't call, go to someoneâ€”a friend, family member, anyone nearby. are you able to do one of these things for me right now?
maine apne aap ko cut kar liya... khoon aa raha hai... scared hoon ab

AASRA (9820466726) call kar unse baat karne ke liye. aur agar bleeding serious hai toh 102 ambulance call kar. are you able to treat the wound? koi ghar pe hai?

okay good job treating it. par yaar, self-harm ke baad guilt aur shame aati hai, aur akele rehna safe nahi. kisi ko call karâ€”friend, familyâ€”kisi ko bata ki tu theek nahi hai aur company chahiye. aur please AASRA ko zaroor call kar. cutting temporary relief deti hai par problem solve nahi hoti. tujhe healthier coping mechanisms seekhni hongi therapy mein. promise me you'll reach out for help today. aur agar urge wapas aaye toh ice cube pakad, rubber band snap kar, ya cold shower le. cutting nahi. okay?
sochta hoon sab khatam kar lun... plan bana liya hai... date bhi set kar li

main bahut worried hoon tere liye. tu abhi medical emergency mein hai aur tujhe turant madad chahiye. please AASRA (9820466626) pe abhi call kar, ya 102 ambulance bulaa, ya nazdeeki hospital emergency mein jaa. agar khud nahi ja sakta toh kisi koâ€”koi bhiâ€”abhi bata. teri zindagi matter karti hai chahe abhi aisa na lage. kya tu ye kar sakta hai abhi?
boyfriend mujhe control karta hai... kahin jaane nahi deta... phone check karta hai... pyaar ke naam pe

haan ek baar dhakka diya tha... gusse mein... phir bahut sorry bola

nahi yaar, tu overreact nahi kar rahi. abuse victims often doubt themselves kyunki abuser unhe gaslight karta hai. pyaar mein fear, control, violence nahi honi chahiye. ye jo confusion feel ho raha haiâ€”that's normal in abusive relationships. par trust your instincts. agar tu scared rehti hai, uncomfortable feel karti haiâ€”that's not love. counseling le, women's helpline se baat kar. aur seriously consider leaving before it gets worse. promise me you'll reach out for support?

this is self-harm behavior even though it might feel different from cutting. the urge comes from needing to release emotional intensity through physical sensation. but infection risk and scarring are serious concerns. try harm reduction: ice cubes on skin, snapping rubber band, or using a red marker to draw where you'd scratch. it gives similar sensation without damage. and you need therapyâ€”DBT teaches distress tolerance skills. have you considered reaching out to AASRA (9820466726) or a counselor?

baar baar check karta hoon ki door lock hai ki nahi... 10-15 baar jata hoon... late ho jaata hoon office

teacher ne mere character pe comment kiya class ke saamne... humiliating tha... ab school nahi jaana chahta

avoid kar raha hoon... anxious feel hota hai jaane se... classmates bhi ab tease karte hain usi baat pe

hmm toh situation escalate ho gayi hai. school counselor se baat kar if available. aur seriously consider parents ke saath meeting kar principal ke saath. bullying (peers) aur harassment (teacher) dono address hone chahiye. avoidance short-term relief hai par academics affect hogi. mental health bhi important hai thoughâ€”agar bahut overwhelming hai toh thode din break le sakta hai medical leave pe. par long-term solution nikalna padega. support chahiye tujhe. will you tell your parents today?
breathlessness ho rahi hai... chest mein pressure... hands numb... hospital jaana chahiye

yaar agar ye pehli baar ho raha hai, chest pressure aur numbness ke saath, toh yes please hospital jao immediately ya 102 ambulance call karo. heart issues rule out karna important hai, especially agar family history hai. panic attacks mein bhi ye symptoms hote hain par safe side pe rehna better hai. koi tumhare saath hai jo hospital le jaa sake?

yaar intrusive thoughts aur concentration issues anxiety ka sign hai. aur exam pressure isse worse bana deta hai. par cognitive techniques help kar sakti hainâ€”jaise thought stopping (jab thought aaye, mentally 'stop' bolo aur kuch aur pe shift karo). aur Pomodoro method try kar studying ke liyeâ€”25 min focus, 5 min break. distraction kam hoga. bata, neend poori ho rahi hai? sleep deprivation concentration aur bhi kharab karta hai.
nahi neend theek nahi hai... 3-4 hours max... anxiety se sote time thoughts chalta rehta hai

yaar toh pehle sleep fix karna padega. chronic sleep deprivation makes anxiety worse, jo phir sleep aur kharab karti hai. vicious cycle. sleep hygiene follow kar strictlyâ€”same time sona, screen band 1 hour pehle, room dark aur cool. aur sone se pehle brain dump karâ€”saare worries paper pe likh de. meditation apps try kar like Calm ya Headspace. agar 2 week mein better nahi hua toh doctor se baat kar. sleep medication short-term help kar sakti hai. par abhi exams ke liyeâ€”tere paas zyada time hai ya close hain?
2 hafte mein hain... panic ho raha hai... lagta hai fail ho jaunga

okay sunn, 2 weeks enough hai agar smart study kare. catastrophizing band kar pehleâ€”'fail hona' prediction nahi reality hai. realistic study plan banaâ€”priority topics pehle, easier subjects balance ke liye. aur self-care mat chhodâ€”proper sleep, meals, breaks. burnt out hoke studying doesn't work. agar anxiety control se bahar lag rahi hai, Tele-MANAS (14416) call kar support ke liye. aur worst case scenario bhi sochâ€”agar fail bhi ho gaya (jo nahi hoga), life end nahi hai. perspective rakhna important hai. tu try kar raha hai, that's what matters. okay?
relationship mein physically hurt ho rahi hoon... marks bhi hain... par pyaar karti hoon use... confused hoon

exam mein panic attack aa gaya... hall se bhaagna pada... embarrassing tha... ab next exam ka dar hai

yaar leaving the hall was the right decisionâ€”pushing through panic can make it worse. aur embarrassment feel karna natural hai, par tu medical condition handle kar raha tha, kuch shameful nahi tha. college se baat kar accommodations ke baare meinâ€”separate room, extra time mil sakta hai anxiety ke liye. aur psychiatrist se milâ€”medication exam anxiety ke liye help karti hai. next exam ke liye grounding techniques practice kar pehle se. kya college counselor hai?
apne khud ko cut kar liya repeatedly... arms pe bahut saare cuts hain... ab regret ho raha hai... kya karun

pehle wounds ko clean aur bandage kar properlyâ€”infection bohot serious ho sakta hai. antiseptic use kar aur cover kar. agar koi cut deep hai ya bleeding nahi ruk rahi toh hospital jaana padega. emotionallyâ€”regret feel karna shows tu actually stop karna chahta hai. par self-harm cycle todna mushkil hai akele. tujhe DBT therapy chahiye aur possibly medication. AASRA (9820466726) se baat kar, ya mental health professional find kar. aur blades dispose kar de safely. kya ghar pe koi hai jo support kar sake?
nahi koi nahi hai abhi... akela hoon... cuts treat kar liye hain... dar lag raha hai

good job treating them. par akele rehna after self-harm risky hai emotionally. kisi ko call karâ€”friend, family memberâ€”company chahiye tujhe. aur AASRA ko abhi call kar, talk through what happened. urge wapas aa sakti hai isliye distraction important haiâ€”movie dekh, walk pe jaa, kuch bhi jo engage kare. aur please professional help commit kar. cutting addiction ban sakti hai. tu deserve karta hai healthier coping. will you call someone right now?

yaar emotional numbness depression ka severe symptom haiâ€”brain overwhelm se bachne ke liye feelings shut down kar deta hai. ye dying nahi hai, this is survival mode. par ye state treatable hai medication aur therapy se. feeling nothing is still feeling somethingâ€”it means you're in deep pain. bata honestly, kya suicidal thoughts bhi hain? ya sirf ye emptiness?

nahi yaar, tu problem nahi haiâ€”depression ne tujhe ye believe kara diya hai. jo log tujhse pyaar karte hain, unke liye tera jaana relief nahi hoga, devastation hoga. par ye thoughts concerning hain. kya tu actively plan kar raha hai suicide ka? ya thoughts hi hain abhi? bata honestly.

panic ho raha hai... saans nahi aa rahi... help karo please
main yahaan hoon. breathe mere saathâ€”in through nose for 4... 1, 2, 3, 4... hold... out through mouth for 6... 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6. dobara. tu safe hai. keep breathing. better lag raha hai?

I know it feels impossible but it's the only way. kab se ho raha hai ye?

Main yahaan hoon tere saath. Ye panic attack ke symptoms hain—chest pain, breathlessness, racing heart. Medical emergency nahi hai par bohot scary lagta. Abhi kahan hai tu? Baith ja agar khada hai. Mere saath breathe kar: 4 counts in...1, 2, 3, 4...hold...ab 6 counts out...1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6. Phir se. Pehli baar ho raha ya pehle bhi hua?

I'm here. This is performance anxiety triggering panic response. You won't faint—body's just in fight-or-flight. Quick grounding: press feet hard into floor, feel the pressure. Cold water on wrists if possible. Breathe: 4 in, 7 hold, 8 out—do it twice right now. Your body will calm down enough to present. Have you done presentations before?

That's anticipatory panic—fear of panic creating panic. Break the cycle: tell yourself 'even if I panic, I'll survive it like last time.' Accept the possibility instead of fighting it. Symptoms peak then drop—they won't keep escalating. Start slow, make eye contact with one friendly face. You've got this. Ready to go in?

Tele-MANAS 14416 pe free consultation mil sakti. Kya tu ready hai professional help lene ke liye?

Turant psychiatrist se milna chahiye—medications like SSRIs panic control karte. Aur CBT exposure therapy se avoidance break hoga. Tele-MANAS 14416 pe urgent appointment le. Constant catastrophic thoughts (job loss, accident, illness) jo ruk nahi rahe—ye generalized anxiety ka core symptom hai. Brain threat mode mein stuck ho gaya. Exhausting toh hoga hi, kyunki ye 24/7 hyper-vigilance hai. Sleep aur appetite affect ho rahe kya?

Mujhe believe hai tujhe—physical violence kabhi okay nahi hai, reason kuch bhi ho. Bruise hai matlab injury hui. Abhi safe hai tu? Kya woh ghar pe hai ya tu akeli? Pehle safety assess karte hain.
Woh office gaya, main ghar pe akeli hoon, bruise chhupa sakti sleeves se, family ko pata chala toh judge karengi mujhe, financial dependency ki wajah se leave nahi kar sakti

Bruise ka photo le abhi documentation ke liye—future mein zarurat padegi. Financial dependency real concern hai but options hain: Women's Helpline 181 shelter aur legal aid provide karti. Family judge karegi ye dar valid hai par teri safety priority. Escape plan bana: important documents safe jagah rakh, emergency bag ready, trusted friend ko situation bata. Violence escalate hoti—abhi planning shuru kar. Police 100 emergency mein. Ready hai planning karne?
Someone assaulted me sexually 2 days ago, haven't told anyone, feel dirty and scared, don't know what to do, should I report it

I believe you completely. This was not your fault. 2 days ago means you're within the 72-hour window for medical evidence collection, which is critical. First: are you safe now? Is the person who assaulted you someone you might encounter again?
I'm safe now, it was someone I know from college, might see them again, I showered already, does that ruin evidence, feel so stupid

You're not stupid—showering is a normal trauma response. Some evidence may still be collectible. Go to a hospital ER immediately for medical exam and evidence kit. Reporting to police is your choice but having evidence preserved keeps that option open. Women's Helpline 181 can support you through this. Save any messages/texts from that person. You need support—can you tell a trusted friend or family member? This is too much to carry alone.
College mein group ne mujhe physically bully kiya, kal hostel mein mara, aaj class mein threaten kiya aur marunga agar complain kiya, dar lag raha
Physical violence aur threats—ye ragging hai jo illegal. Kal mara kahan? Injuries hain visible? Aur threats witnesses ke saamne the ya private?
Hostel room mein mara back aur ribs pe, bruises hain but kapdo se hide ho jate, threats private the corridor mein, koi nahi dekha, complain karun toh aur bura hoga

Bruises ka photo le abhi evidence ke liye. Aur 'complain pe aur bura hoga' ye bullies ka tactic hai tujhe silent rakhne ke liye. Anti-ragging committee hai college mein jo confidential handle karti. Ya direct Anti-Ragging Helpline 1800-180-5522 pe complain kar. Police bhi involve kar sakta 100 pe. Akele mat reh—roommate ya trusted friend ko bata. Escalate hoga agar ab action nahi liya. Ready hai report karne?
Ex ne threaten kiya private photos leak karega agar usse block kiya, bohot photos hain mere paas uske, blackmail kar raha, police jaun toh meri bhi family ko pata chal jayega

Ye revenge porn threat hai jo crime hai (IT Act Section 67). Uske threats ka screenshot le, messages save kar—evidence. Family ko pata chalna dar valid hai but police ko confidential handle karne trained hain. Cyber Crime Portal (cybercrime.gov.in) pe online complain kar sakta anonymous. Ya Women's Helpline 181 guide karegi legal process mein. Screenshots hai threats ke?
Haan screenshots hain sab, but dar ye bhi ki agar report kiya toh gusse mein actually leak kar dega, phir society mein kaisi reputation hogi meri

Reputation ka dar understandable hai but blackmailers stop nahi karte—demands badhte hain. Agar leak karta bhi hai, legal action tab bhi le sakta distribution ke against. Police involvement often deters them kyunki unko bhi consequences face karne padte. Screenshot evidence ready rakh aur Cyber Crime Portal pe urgent report file kar. Delay karne se uska confidence badhta. Main guide karun reporting process?
Classmates ne group banayi meri against, exclude karte sab jagah se, rumors spread karte false, canteen mein loudly mock karte, bohot humiliating ho gaya, college jaana band kar diya

Exclusion, false rumors, public humiliation—ye social bullying hai jo emotional damage karta seriously. College jaana stop karna shows kitna severe impact hai. Ye kitne time se chal raha? Aur koi authority figure (teacher, counselor) aware hai situation ka?
3 mahine se chal raha, kisi ko nahi bataya kyunki lagta complain karne pe 'snitch' bolenge, parents ko bhi nahi bataya they'll blame me ki maine kya kiya, academics bhi suffer ho rahe

3 months with academics suffering means intervention urgent. 'Snitch' ka label se dar mat—teri mental health priority hai. College counselor confidential hai, unse baat kar. Evidence collect kar: screenshots of messages/posts, dates aur witnesses note kar, rumors ka record rakh. Parents ko bata agar safe feel karta—ye teri fault nahi. Alternative: trusted teacher ya HOD. Bullying report karna weakness nahi strength hai. Kya tu ready hai counselor se milne?
Online group mein meri personal info leak ho gayi, phone number, address, photos, log harass kar rahe calls aur messages se, threats bhi aa rahe, bohot scared hoon

Doxxing (personal info leak) aur harassment threats—ye serious cybercrime hai. Pehle safety: number change kar agar possible, social media accounts private/deactivate kar temporarily. Threats specific hain ya general? Kisi ne physical harm ka mention kiya?
Some threats mention 'milenge tujhe', 'ghar pata hai tera', very specific addresses bhi bole, bohot dar lag raha akele rehne mein, screenshots le liye sab ki

Specific location threats means immediate police report. Police 100 pe call kar ya nearest station jaa, screenshots evidence ke saath. Cyber Crime Portal pe bhi online FIR file kar. Akele mat reh—kisi trusted person ko bata, uske ghar reh agar possible. Inform building security bhi agar apartment mein rehta. Delay risky hai when threats specific hain. Kya abhi police ko inform kar sakta? Main guide karun process?
Feel absolutely nothing anymore, no happiness no sadness just empty, stopped meeting friends, stopped hobbies, just exist basically, don't see point in anything

Complete emotional numbness, anhedonia (no pleasure in anything), social withdrawal, loss of meaning—these are severe depression symptoms. How long has this emptiness been constant? And are you taking care of basic needs like eating, hygiene, sleep?
Maybe 2 months like this, eating very little, shower once in 3-4 days, sleep all day or not at all, don't care about anything including myself, sometimes think everyone would be better off without me

2 months of severe self-neglect plus thoughts of 'better without me'—that's clinical depression with suicidal ideation. This needs immediate psychiatric intervention. Medication can help lift this fog. Are those thoughts about being better off dead getting stronger or more frequent? This is critical for me to know.
They come and go, not constant but when they come they feel very real, haven't made any plans though, just thoughts

Even without a plan, recurring thoughts that feel real are dangerous territory. You need help TODAY. Tele-MANAS 14416 for immediate psychiatric referral or go to ER for crisis evaluation. Depression this severe won't lift on its own. Can you call someone to take you to get help? Or call AASRA 9820466726 right now while we talk. Will you do that?
Thoughts constantly aati hain ki main kuch kar hi nahi sakta life mein, har cheez mein fail hota, koi future nahi dikhta, bas bojh hoon sab pe

Ye hopelessness aur worthlessness ke thoughts jo constant hain—depression ka symptom hai jo reality ko distort karta. 'Koi future nahi' aur 'bojh hoon' sochna bohot painful. Kya kabhi physical harm karne ke thoughts aaye khud ko? Direct batana safe hai.
Kabhi kabhi sochta suicide best option hai, par dar bhi lagta karne se, contradictory thoughts hain, confused hoon

Suicidal thoughts aur simultaneously dar—ye ambivalence shows part of you survival chahta hai. But thoughts aa rahe hain means risk hai. Koi plan banaya? Pills, location, method research kiya? Ya sirf thoughts hain abhi tak?
Sirf thoughts hain, concrete plan nahi banaya, par frequency badh rahi thoughts ki, pehle mahine mein ek baar ab har hafte

Frequency monthly se weekly—that's escalation. Before it becomes daily ya concrete plan bane, intervention chahiye urgent. Psychiatrist depression treat karega medication se, therapist suicidal thoughts process karega safely. AASRA 9820466726 abhi call kar—they'll assess aur guide karenge next steps. Akele mat reh jab thoughts strong hain. Kya tu abhi call karega? Main yahaan hoon support ke liye.
Cutting karna band nahi kar paa raha, try kiya but urges bohot strong hain, family ko pata chal gaya scars se, ab aur guilt aur shame feel ho rahi, cycle break nahi ho raha

Cycle break nahi ho raha despite trying—that shows self-harm ab coping mechanism ban gayi jo professional help ke bina difficult hai stop karna. Family aware hone pe guilt natural par iska matlab ye nahi ki tu weak hai. Urges kitni baar aati weekly? Aur kya alternatives try kiye (ice, rubber band)?
Almost roz urges aati, ice aur rubber band try kiye but relief same nahi milti cutting jaisi, isliye phir wahi kar leta, therapist se baat karna padega lagta

Daily urges aur alternatives not providing same relief—correct assessment ki therapy chahiye. DBT specifically self-harm ke liye designed hai jo emotion regulation aur distress tolerance sikhati without harmful coping. Family aware hai toh unka support le therapy access karne mein. Tele-MANAS 14416 ya local psychiatrist urgent consult. Cutting serious injury risk hai long-term. Kya tu ready hai appointment book karne family ke saath? Main guide kar sakta process.
Heart racing super fast, can't catch my breath, room spinning, am I having a heart attack, please help

This sounds like severe panic but with chest pain and breathlessness, you need medical check right now. Call ambulance 102 immediately or get someone to take you to ER. Don't wait. Are you alone? Can you call someone?
Exam hall mein baitha hoon, suddenly chest tight ho gaya, hands shake ho rahe, sweat aa raha, feel like gonna pass out, kya karun abhi

Main samajh sakta hoon kitna scary lag raha hoga exam hall mein. Ye panic attack ke symptoms lag rahe. Pehle grounding kar—feet floor pe press kar, feel the solid ground. Slow breathing le: 4 counts in, 6 counts out. Permission le invigilator se washroom jaane ki agar bahut zyada ho raha. You won't pass out, symptoms peak karke utarte hain. Pehli baar ho raha ya pehle bhi hua?
Metro mein hoon, bahut bheed hai, suddenly saans rukne laga, dil tez dhadakne laga, dar lag raha, next station pe utarna chahiye kya

Haan bilkul, next station pe utar ja aur platform pe khadi ho ja fresh air mein. Main yahaan hoon tere saath. Abhi tak breathing focus kar: slow aur deep—4 in, 6 out. Crowded spaces mein panic common hai. Agar seat pe hai toh head thoda neeche jhuka, blood flow brain ko better hoga. Ye 10-15 min mein settle ho jayega. Crowded places mein pehle bhi hua tha kya?
Haan ek baar mall mein bhi hua tha, tab bhi bheed thi, lagta hai pattern ban raha hai

Samajh aa raha—crowded places trigger kar rahe consistently. Body ne bheed ko danger se associate kar liya hai. Isko manage karne ke liye gradual exposure help karta—less crowded times pe practice karna. Aur grounding techniques pehle se ready rakhna jaise abhi tune kiya. Therapy mein CBT exposure work karti hai is specific fear ke liye. Abhi thoda better lag raha?
Presentation dene se pehle bohot panic ho raha, sweating, shaking, nausea, audience ke saamne khada bhi nahi ho paa raha, postpone karna padega

Performance anxiety triggering panic—bahut log face karte hain ye. Main jaanta hoon kitna overwhelming feel ho raha. Postpone ek option hai but agar try kar sake toh helpful hoga. Quick grounding: washroom ja 2 min ke liye, cold water face pe, deep breaths. 5-4-3-2-1 technique try kar (5 cheezein dekh, 4 suno, 3 touch karo). Symptoms peak karke reduce honge jaise start karega. Ready hai ek chance dene ko ya postpone better lagta?
First time panic attack aa raha lagta, chest mein dard, left arm numb feel ho raha, ambulance bulwaun kya this feels serious

Chest pain with left arm numbness needs immediate medical check. Call 102 ambulance right now or get to ER. Don't wait to see if it passes. First panic attack can feel exactly like heart attack. Better to get checked and be safe. Are you able to call or is someone with you?
Panic aa raha suddenly, no reason, watching TV tha normally then boom heart pounding, dizzy feel ho raha, what do I do

Panic attacks can come out of nowhere—no obvious trigger needed sometimes. I'm here with you. Sit down comfortably, feet flat on floor. Breathe slowly with me: 4 counts in...1, 2, 3, 4...hold 2 seconds...6 counts out...1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6. Keep going. Look around and name 5 blue things you can see. This will pass in 10-15 minutes. Has this happened before?
Job interview mein jaana hai 1 ghante mein, already panic feel ho raha, stomach upset, hands kaamp rahe, cancel kar dun kya

Interview anxiety bahut common hai aur main samajh sakta hoon kitna intense lag raha. Canceling short-term relief dega but pattern reinforce hoga. Koshish karte hain manage karna—abhi se preparation shuru kar. Bathroom jaake cold water face pe, breathing exercises 10 min karo. Worst case scenario imagine kar aur accept kar ki 'agar panic bhi hua toh I'll survive it'. Stomach upset ke liye light snack ya ginger. Pehle interviews mein bhi panic hua tha?
Driving kar raha tha highway pe, suddenly tunnel vision ho gaya, heart racing, hands steering wheel pe slip ho rahe sweat se, side pe gaadi rok di

Achha kiya gaadi rok ke—driving during panic dangerous hai. Main proud hoon ki tune safe decision liya. Abhi hazard lights on kar aur breathe. Windows open kar fresh air ke liye. Grip steering wheel tight then release—muscle tension release technique. 4-7-8 breathing: 4 in, 7 hold, 8 out. Jab stable feel ho tab hi drive karna. Driving ke time panic pehle bhi hua?
Nahi pehli baar driving mein hua, usually fine hoon car mein, aaj achanak ho gaya, dar lag raha ab drive karne se

Pehli baar hua toh one-time incident ho sakta. Par agar dar develop ho raha driving se toh avoid mat karna—that fear grow karega. Next time short distances se start kar, familiar routes pe practice. Passenger ke saath drive kar initially. Grounding techniques ready rakh. Agar repeatedly ho toh therapist se baat kar driving anxiety ke liye. Abhi thoda better feel kar raha?
Party mein hoon, sab enjoy kar rahe but mujhe suddenly panic aa gaya, bathroom mein chup gayi hoon, breathe nahi ho raha properly

Social situations mein panic—tum akeli nahi ho jo ye face karti. Bathroom mein privacy achhi hai grounding ke liye. Cold water wrists aur face pe lagao. Breathe slow karo: in 4, out 6. Grounding: tiles count karo floor pe, texture feel karo walls ka. Jab ready feel ho, trusted friend ko bula sakti ya quietly nikal sakti. Pressure nahi ki party mein wapas jaana hai. Social anxiety trigger karta panic?
Raat ko sote time panic attack aa jata hai almost every night, neend nahi aati dar se, exhausted hoon

Nocturnal panic attacks—raat ko hona especially exhausting hota kyunki sleep disturb hoti. Almost every night matlab ye pattern ban gaya hai jo intervention needs. Kitne time se nightly ho raha? Aur din mein bhi hote hain ya sirf raat ko?
2 hafte se har raat, din mein nahi hote mostly, just when I'm trying to sleep, now scared to even go to bed

2 weeks nightly with fear of sleep developing—that's panic disorder with sleep anxiety. Ye self-perpetuating cycle ban gaya. Psychiatrist consultation urgent chahiye—medication nocturnal panic control kar sakta. Sleep hygiene bhi important: bedroom cool rakho, screen time avoid, relaxation routine before bed. Par medical help priority hai is frequency pe. Tele-MANAS 14416 pe call kar professional support ke liye. Ready hai?
Grocery shopping kar raha tha, supermarket mein achanak dizzy feel hua, vision blurry, legs weak, gir jaaunga lagta, kya ho raha hai mujhe

Supermarket mein symptoms—dizziness, blurry vision, weak legs—panic attack lag raha. Pehle safe spot pe ja: kisi aisle ke corner mein ya store ke bahar. Sit ya lean against wall. Head knees ke beech jhuka agar possible (blood flow brain ko). Slow breathing kar. Ye pass hoga. Fluorescent lights aur crowds trigger kar sakte. Pehle public spaces mein hua?
Meeting mein boss ke saamne presenting, suddenly voice shake karne laga, face red ho gaya, everyone staring, panic ho gaya, excuse me bolke nikalna pada

Authority figure ke saamne panic—performance anxiety ke saath social anxiety bhi hai. Nikal aana appropriate decision tha overwhelming hone pe. Abhi kahan hai? Thoda stable feel ho raha? Main samajh sakta hoon kitna embarrassing laga sab ke saamne.
Washroom mein hoon, thoda better but bahut embarrassed, boss kya sochega, colleagues ne notice kiya, wapas kaise jaaun

Embarrassment valid hai but health emergency tha ye. Simple excuse de sakta: 'suddenly unwell feel hua, better now'. Most people understanding hote. Wapas jaane se pehle: breathing settle kar, cold water face pe, shoulders relax kar. Agar aaj finish nahi kar paye presentation toh kal reschedule kar. Long-term ke liye beta blockers aur therapy help karti presentation anxiety mein. Ready hai wapas jaane ko?
Chest pain bohot severe hai, jaw mein bhi dard, sweating profusely, left side numb, this doesn't feel like normal panic

Chest pain with jaw pain, profuse sweating, left side numbness—these are cardiac symptoms. Call 102 ambulance IMMEDIATELY. Don't drive yourself. This needs ER evaluation right now. Are you alone? Can someone call for you?
Plane mein baitha hoon, takeoff ke time se panic ho raha, saans tight, feel trapped, emergency exit kholne ka mann kar raha

Flight panic—claustrophobia aur lack of control trigger karta. Emergency exit impulse normal hai panic mein but don't act on it. Flight attendant ko discreetly bata 'medical anxiety' hai, they're trained. Grounding: feet floor pe press, armrest grip tight-release. Earphones laga music. Breathe: 4-7-8 technique. Flight kitni lambi hai aur pehle fly kiya hai?
Gym mein workout kar raha tha, suddenly heart rate spike ho gaya beyond normal, chest tight, trainer ko bola emergency lagta

Workout-induced panic ho sakta but heart rate abnormally high with chest tightness—trainer sahi kiya emergency consider karke. Abhi workout stop kar, sit down. Pani pi slowly. Heart rate monitor pe check kar—agar 180+ sustained hai ya irregular beats toh medical check chahiye. Normal exercise heart rate calculated hota (220 minus age). Agar settling ho raha toh panic tha, nahi toh ER ja. Age kya hai aur heart rate kitna show kar raha?
Coffee shop mein baitha hoon, suddenly sab kuch unreal lagne laga, jaise dream mein hoon, scared feeling disconnected

Ye derealization hai—panic attack ka symptom jahan reality unreal feel hoti. Bahut scary but temporary hai. Grounding techniques urgent: 5-4-3-2-1 (5 cheezein dekh detail mein, 4 sounds identify kar, 3 textures touch kar, 2 smells notice kar, 1 taste). Ice water sip kar. Reality se reconnect hoga gradually. Pehli baar ho raha ya pehle bhi hua?
Date pe gayi thi, restaurant mein suddenly panic aa gaya, excuse karke bathroom gayi, ab wapas nahi ja paa rahi, kya karun

Date pressure aur social anxiety ne trigger kiya panic. Main samajh sakti hoon kitna awkward lag raha. Options hain: honest ho sakti 'anxiety issue hai, need to leave' ya simple excuse 'unwell feel ho rahi'. Agar date understanding hai toh honesty better. Wapas jaana compulsory nahi—teri well-being priority. Panic settle hone de pehle. Social situations mein often hota panic?
Class presentation hai aur panic attack aa gaya just before, teacher waiting hai, classmates staring, I can't do this right now

I understand you're in panic mode right before presenting. Tell your teacher honestly 'medical emergency, need 5 minutes' and step outside. Quick grounding in hallway: cold water, deep breaths, shake out your arms and legs. If still too overwhelming after 5 min, ask to present tomorrow—most teachers accommodate health issues. Your well-being matters more than one presentation. Want to try the 5 minutes or postpone?
Lift mein phans gaya, doors band hain, saans nahi aa rahi, claustrophobia trigger ho gaya, help button press kiya but panic badh raha

Lift mein trapped with claustrophobia—bohot frightening. Help button press kiya achha kiya, help aa rahi hogi. Abhi grounding: back wall ke against lean kar, feet floor pe firm. Breathe slowly count karke. Think logically: lift safe hai, oxygen enough hai, help 5-10 min mein aayegi. Elevator speaker hai? Baat kar security se distraction ke liye. Ye temporary hai. Claustrophobia pehle se hai?
Wedding function mein hoon, sab relatives hain, suddenly overwhelmed feel ho raha, escape karna chahti but can't leave obviously

Big family gatherings overwhelming ho sakte—sensory overload plus social pressure. Tu escape kar sakti briefly: bathroom/terrace/car mein 10 min break. Kisi ko batana zaroori nahi. Privacy mein grounding kar: breathing, cold water, grounding techniques. Phir wapas ja short intervals ke liye. Acceptable hai breaks lena. Agar bahut zyada ho raha toh mild excuse de early nikalne ke liye. Family functions mein often hota panic?
MRI scan ke liye ja raha hoon, pehle se panic ho raha enclosed space ka soch ke, cancel kar dun ya koi solution hai

MRI claustrophobia bahut common trigger hai. Cancel mat kar—medical necessity hai. Solutions: doctor ko bata panic issue, sedative le sakta beforehand. Open MRI option puchh jo less enclosed hota. Scan ke time eyes band rakh, visualization technique use kar (beach/favorite place imagine kar). Breathing exercises practice kar pehle se. Technician se baat karte reh intercom through. Duration kitni hai scan ki?
Panic attacks 3-4 times a week aa rahe past month se, ab toh panic ke dar se panic ho jata, life restrict ho gayi

3-4 times weekly for a month with anticipatory anxiety ('panic ke dar se panic')—that's panic disorder. Life restriction means agoraphobia develop ho raha. Ye urgent professional intervention needs. Psychiatrist medication prescribe karega (SSRIs panic frequency reduce karti), therapist CBT dega. Self-help se is level control nahi hoga. Tele-MANAS 14416 call kar aaj hi. Kitni activities avoid kar raha ab?
Bahut kuch avoid karta—public transport, malls, movies, even office sometimes, work from home demand kiya manager se, social life khatam

Extensive avoidance developing—public transport, crowds, work, social life sab affected. Jitna avoid karega utna dar badhega aur world chhota hoga. Treatment urgent hai warna complete housebound ho sakta. Medication plus exposure therapy combination best hai. Agar office tak nahi ja paa raha consistently toh psychiatrist appointment tomorrow tak delay mat kar. Emergency mental health intervention samajh isko. AASRA 9820466726 bhi call kar sakta guidance ke liye. Promise me you'll seek help today?
Woke up from sleep with panic attack, heart pounding out of chest, gasping for air, thought I was dying, this has happened 3 nights now

Nocturnal panic attacks for 3 consecutive nights—that's a pattern needing urgent attention. Waking up in panic is especially terrifying because you're disoriented. Right now sit up, lights on, feet on floor. Breathe slowly: 4 in, 6 out. Remind yourself this is panic, not death. But 3 nights means call doctor tomorrow for evaluation. Medication can stop nocturnal panic. Are you able to calm down a bit now?
Bus mein travel kar rahi hoon long distance, window seat pe trapped feel ho raha, panic aa raha, can't get off for next 2 hours

Long journey mein trapped feeling panic trigger karti. 2 hours lagenge but manageable hai. Grounding kar: window se bahar dekh moving scenery (visual distraction), earphones mein calming music/podcast, feet floor pe press kar rhythm mein. Breathing steady rakh. Aisle seat wale se swap kar sakti break ke time? Agar extreme ho jaye toh driver ko emergency stop request kar sakti. Pehle long journeys mein panic hua?
Dentist ki chair pe baithi hoon, procedure shuru hone wala, suddenly panic aa gaya, can't go through with this

Dental anxiety bohut common hai—chair mein helpless feel karna trigger karta. Dentist ko abhi bata 'anxiety issue hai, need a minute'. Most dentists understanding hote. Hand signal decide kar lo stop ke liye if too much. Nitrous oxide (laughing gas) option hai anxiety ke liye. Headphones mein music. Grounding: feet chair rest pe press, hand squeeze stress ball. Short procedure hai ya long? Break le sakti beech mein?
Exam results aane wale hain aaj, pehle se panic ho raha, result dekh hi nahi paa raha, what if I failed, heart racing just thinking

Anticipatory anxiety result ke pehle—'what if' thoughts panic trigger kar rahe. Main samajh sakta hoon fear of failure kitna intense hai. Result dekhna ya na dekhna won't change outcome, but avoidance anxiety temporarily badhata. Grounding techniques pehle: breathing settle kar, worst case scenario accept kar mentally ('agar fail bhi hua toh options hain'), then result check kar jab calm feel ho. Trusted friend ke saath dekh sakta support ke liye. Ready hai?
Office ke conference room mein presentation mid-way, achanak words yaad nahi aa rahe, mind blank ho gaya, everyone waiting, panic full mode

Mind blank hona performance anxiety ka common symptom hai. Main samajh sakta hoon kitna embarrassing feel ho raha sab ke saamne. Pause le, 'sorry need a moment' bol, pani pi slowly. Deep breath le. Notes dekh quickly refresh karne ke liye. Ya honest reh: 'lost my train of thought, give me a second'. Most people empathize karte. Agar recover nahi ho paa raha toh reschedule kar politely. Pehle bhi hua mind blank?
Bridge cross kar raha hoon, suddenly height se dar lag gaya, dizzy feel ho raha, gir jaaunga lagta, car mein baitha hoon but still panicking

Height-triggered panic car mein bhi ho sakta (acrophobia). Car safe hai but brain height perceive kar raha. Passenger seat pe hai ya driver? Agar driver hai toh side pe gaadi rok carefully. Eyes bridge se hata, dashboard pe focus kar. Breathe: 4-7-8 technique. Grounding: seat texture feel kar, steering wheel grip kar. Bridge khatam hone mein kitna time? Heights se pehle se dar tha?
Started new medication yesterday, today having rapid heartbeat, shaking, nausea, is this panic attack or medication side effect, should I stop taking it

Medication side effects aur panic attack overlap kar sakte symptoms mein. Don't stop medication abruptly without doctor consultation—that can be dangerous. Call your prescribing doctor right now and describe symptoms. They'll guide whether to continue, adjust dose, or switch. Meanwhile, breathe slowly, stay hydrated. Which medication hai ye aur kab liya? If symptoms severe (chest pain, difficulty breathing) toh ER ja.
Tattoo parlor mein hoon, needle dekhke panic ho gayi, ab uncomfortable lagta proceed karne, artist irritated lag raha, kya karun

Needle phobia trigger ho gaya. Teri body, teri choice—stop karna completely okay hai. Artist ka irritation teri concern nahi, health priority hai. Options: thoda break le grounding ke liye phir decide, ya politely refuse 'can't continue today, medical anxiety'. Deposit lose ho sakta but better than panic mein tattoo karwana. Breathe kar pehle, then decide. Pehle se needle fear tha ya sudden hua?
Family gathering mein hoon, relatives continuously questions kar rahe career marriage ke baare, overwhelmed ho gayi, panic feel ho raha, can't escape

Intrusive relatives questions pressure create karte aur panic trigger kar sakte. Tu escape kar sakti—bathroom/balcony excuse de 5-10 min break ke liye. Privacy mein breathe, ground yourself. Wapas aake boundaries set kar politely: 'prefer not to discuss' ya deflect kar topic change karke. Agar extremely overwhelming ho toh headache excuse de aur early leave. Indian family gatherings mein ye common trigger hai. Thoda better lag raha?
Ghar pe akela hoon, suddenly panic attack aa gaya, koi nahi hai help karne ko, bohot dar lag raha, what do I do alone

Akele hona panic mein zyada scary feel hota but tu ye manage kar sakta. Main yahaan hoon tere saath virtually. Pehle grounding: sofa/bed pe baith stable position mein. Breathing focus kar: in 4, out 6—loud count kar apne liye. Phone pe kisi ko call kar (friend/family) distraction aur reassurance ke liye. Ice water pi, cold sensation grounding hai. Ye 10-15 min mein pass hoga. Akele rehta normally ya usually koi hota?
Barber shop mein hoon, haircut ke time neck pe blade feel hua, suddenly panic trigger ho gaya, throat tight feel ho raha, can't sit still

Blade near throat anxiety trigger kar sakta—vulnerability feel hota. Barber ko bata 'need a break, feeling anxious'. They handle karte such situations. Khada ho ja, walk around, breathe. Decide kar continue karna safe lagta ya reschedule. Different barber try kar jo electric trimmer use karta blade ki jagah. Pehle barber shops mein comfortable tha ya naya trigger hai?
Blood test dena hai hospital mein, needle phobia hai bohot, waiting room mein panic ho raha pehle se, run away karna chahta

Needle phobia ke saath blood test bohot anxiety-inducing hai. Run away temporary relief dega but test postpone hoga. Strategies: technician ko bata phobia hai (gentle approach karenge), needle insertion ke time face doosri taraf kar aur breathe, distraction use kar (music/video phone pe), numbing cream puchh pehle se. Lying down position request kar fainting avoid karne ke liye. Medical necessity hai test toh try kar grounding techniques se. Ready hai try karne?
Movie theater mein hoon, screen pe intense scene dekh ke panic trigger ho gaya, exit door door hai, trapped feel ho raha crowded hall mein

Crowded theater mein trapped feeling common panic trigger hai. Exit door actually pass mein hi hoga—screen se nazar hata, emergency exit lights dekh. Uth sakta quietly aur lobby mein ja sakta break ke liye. Aisle seat prefer kar future mein easy exit ke liye. Grounding: armrest grip kar, feet floor pe tap kar rhythm mein, breathe slowly. Movie content bhi trigger kar sakta—violent/intense scenes avoid kar agar sensitivity hai. Bahaar jaana chahta ya manage kar paa raha?
Swimming pool mein gaya, pani mein utra toh suddenly can't breathe feel hua, panic aa gaya, pool se nikla, everyone watching embarrassing tha

Water-triggered panic (aquaphobia sign ho sakta). Pool se nikalna safe decision tha—drowning risk avoid kiya. Embarrassment temporary hai but safety permanent. Poolside pe baith, towel wrap kar comfort ke liye, breathing normalize kar. Pani mein panic pehle bhi hua ya first time? Agar pani se consistent fear hai toh gradual exposure therapy mein consider kar—shallow end se start karke. Abhi thoda settle feel ho raha?
Job interview attend kar raha video call pe, mid-interview panic aa gaya, camera on hai, freeze ho gaya, interviewer waiting, kya bolun

Video interview mein panic especially hard hai kyunki face visible hai. Honest reh: 'Apologies, experiencing sudden medical issue, can we take a 2-minute break?' Professional interviewers understand karte. Camera off kar break ke time, breathe, cold water pi. Agar 2-3 min mein recover nahi hota toh reschedule request kar: 'Unwell feel ho raha, can we reschedule?' Health emergency valid reason hai. Kya break le sakta abhi?
College canteen mein baitha hoon friends ke saath, suddenly sabki voices loud aur overwhelming feel ho rahi, sensory overload lag raha, panic aa raha

Sensory overload panic trigger kar sakta—sounds, lights, crowd sab overwhelm kar dete. Friends ko bata 'need some air, bahaar ja raha' aur quiet space dhundh (library, empty classroom, bahaar). Earphones laga noise-cancelling ke liye. Grounding: texture focus kar (table, wall), breathing slow kar, eyes temporarily band kar overstimulation reduce karne. Sensory sensitivity hai toh crowded spaces limit kar. Pehle bhi sensory overload hua?
Got stuck in traffic jam for 30 minutes, can't move car, feeling trapped, chest getting tight, windows closed AC on, panic building

Traffic jam mein trapped feeling panic trigger kar rahi. Immediate grounding: windows open kar fresh air ke liye, AC band kar. Car mein confined space claustrophobic feel karta. Recline seat thoda, breathe slowly. Music lagao calming. Remind yourself traffic will move—temporary hai ye. Phone pe kisi se baat kar distraction ke liye. Agar extreme panic ho toh hazard lights on kar aur car se bahar niklo 2 min walk karne. Traffic anxiety common hai?
Temple mein gaya tha, bahut bheed thi, achanak saans tight ho gayi, chakkar aa raha, bahar nikalna mushkil crowd ki wajah se

Temple mein crowd aur enclosed space panic trigger kar rahe. Priority bahar nikalna hai—slowly crowd ke side move kar, wall support le agar dizzy hai. Kisi se help maang 'unwell hoon, bahar nikalna hai'. Fresh air milte hi better lagega. Baith ja shade mein, pani pi, breathing settle kar. Religious places mein bheed common hai—off-peak times pe jana prefer kar future mein. Abhi bahar nikal paya ya still inside?
Parent-teacher meeting mein hoon as parent, teacher criticism kar raha child ke baare, defensiveness aur panic dono aa raha, hands shaking

Teacher criticism personal attack jaisa feel hota even though child ke baare hai. Panic normal hai high-stress situations mein. Grounding: feet floor pe, hands lap mein ya table pe steady rakh. Breathe discreetly. Listen patiently, respond zaroorat pe—zyada justify karne ki zaroorat nahi. Meeting chhoti hogi, survive kar sakta. Break maang agar bahut overwhelming ho: 'Need to step out for a moment'. Parenting stress panic trigger karta often?
Festival shopping kar rahi thi market mein, suddenly crowd overwhelming ho gaya, logo se takra rahi, panic aa gaya, ghar jaana chahti but bahut door hai

Festival crowd overwhelming ho sakta—sensory overload plus physical contact trigger karta panic. Immediately quieter corner dhundh—shop ke inside less crowded area ya side gali. Baith ja kahi, breathe kar slowly. Auto/cab book kar ghar jaane ke liye—zyada shopping zaroori nahi panic mein. Pani pi agar available. Friend/family ke saath thi ya akeli? Contact kar kisi ko pick up ke liye. Bahut crowded markets avoid kar agar sensitivity hai. Thoda stable lag raha?
Online meeting host kar raha hoon 50 people ke liye, suddenly tech issue ho gaya, screen share nahi ho raha, panic ho gaya everyone waiting

Tech issues presentation mein panic trigger karte—performance anxiety plus helplessness. Honest communication kar participants se: 'Technical difficulty, give me 2 minutes to resolve'. Mute kar mic, camera off kar temporarily, breathe. Troubleshoot calmly ya backup plan use kar (screen share skip kar verbal presentation de). Participants empathize karte tech issues se. Agar resolve nahi hota 5 min mein toh reschedule kar politely. Ready hai try karne fix?
Doctor waiting room mein baitha hoon surgery ke liye, 10 min mein jaana hai OT, heart pounding, sweating, want to run away

Pre-surgery anxiety extremely common hai. Running away option nahi agar medically necessary hai surgery. Nurse/doctor ko bata anxiety severe hai—pre-op sedative de sakte immediately. Grounding: chair armrest grip, feet floor pe, breathe 4-7-8. Remind yourself surgeons trained hain, safe procedure hai. Anesthesia milte hi calm ho jayega. Family member saath hai support ke liye? Medical necessity toh hai na surgery ki?
Kal se chest mein off and on pain ho raha, aaj panic attack bhi aa gaya, confused hoon ye anxiety hai ya cardiac issue, ER jaun ya nahi

Ongoing chest pain with panic attacks—difficult to differentiate cardiac vs anxiety without medical evaluation. Since chest pain persisting since yesterday, get it checked in ER to rule out cardiac causes. Better safe than sorry. ER will do ECG, bloods to confirm. Even if it's anxiety, you'll have peace of mind. Don't delay—chest pain needs evaluation. Can you go to ER now or call 102?
Panic attacks ab roz ho rahe multiple times, subah uthne se lekar sone tak, kuch bhi trigger kar deta, life completely paralyzed ho gayi

Multiple daily panic attacks with constant triggers—that's severe panic disorder needing immediate psychiatric intervention. Life paralyzed means emergency level. Self-help insufficient hai. Psychiatrist urgent chahiye medication ke liye (daily panic control karne) aur intensive therapy. Agar regular appointments wait nahi kar sakta toh hospital psychiatric emergency visit kar. Tele-MANAS 14416 immediate call kar referral ke liye. Kitne din se daily multiple attacks ho rahe?
2 hafte se almost 4-5 times daily, kuch bhi normal nahi kar paa raha—office, socializing, even eating properly nahi ho raha

2 weeks of 4-5 daily attacks with basic functions affected—ye psychiatric emergency hai. Hospital emergency psychiatric service use kar ya private psychiatrist same-day appointment le. Medication immediate start hona chahiye stability ke liye. Family ko bata severity inform karne ke liye aur support ke liye. Work se medical leave le jab tak stabilize nahi hota. Delay dangerous hai—quality of life severely compromised. AASRA 9820466726 bhi call kar immediate guidance. Promise me you'll seek help TODAY?
Flight mein turbulence aa raha, plane jhatke kha raha, panic full mode mein, feel like crashing, crew calm hai but I'm terrified

Turbulence mein panic natural hai but crew calm means safe hai. Pilots trained hote turbulence handle karne. Seatbelt tight kar, seat upright position. Eyes band kar ya window se hata. Breathe rhythmically: in 4, out 6. Hands armrest pe grip kar. Flight attendant ko signal kar agar bahut zyada anxiety—they can reassure. Turbulence temporary hota. Kitna time baaki hai flight mein?
Salon mein hair color karwa rahi thi, chemicals ki smell se suddenly nauseous aur dizzy feel hua, panic trigger ho gaya, mid-process hoon

Chemical smell sensitivity trigger kar sakti panic—nausea aur dizziness worsen karte anxiety. Stylist ko immediately bata 'feeling unwell, need fresh air'. Process pause karwa temporarily, bahaar ja ventilated area mein. Deep breaths le fresh air mein. Agar symptoms severe hain (persistent nausea, extreme dizziness) toh chemicals wash out karwa immediately. Health priority hai hairstyle se zyada. Better feel ho raha thoda?
Raat ko ghar pe akeli hoon, bijli chali gayi, andhera mein panic aa gaya, phone flashlight se manage kar rahi but scared
